class.name: ompl_interface/ModelBasedPlanningContext
class.description: A planning context for computing kinematic paths in joint and Cartesian space.

class.name: ompl_interface/JointModelBasedPlanningContext
class.description: A planning context for computing kinematic paths in joint space.

class.name: ompl_interface/PoseModelBasedPlanningContext
class.description: A planning context for computing kinematic paths in Cartesian space.
